title: These Photos of Trump's Meltdown With the Finnish President Are, Collectively, a Work of Art
text: Derek: If your MP is not attempting to represent the constituency which elected them to parliament, but following their own or others agenda be it commercial, union, minority interest, religious faction, foreign government or group, it comes under the classification of desertion of duty. Therefore many MPs need to realise that many citizens will be very disenchanted resulting in others being elected at the next election whenever it happens. We citizens hold our power in choosing to vote for our representatives or not, and it looks like many of the present MPs from all parties need to realise that we employ them, rather than them controlling us mere election fodder, simples.
